Package org.zaproxy.zap.view

Class ComponentMaximiser

java.lang.Object
org.zaproxy.zap.view.ComponentMaximiser
public class ComponentMaximiser extends Object
A utility class to maximise a (non-direct) child Component of a Container.

Adds the component being maximised directly to the container, making it occupy the whole container. The previous state of the container is preserved internally by this class, any changes done to the container should be done only after unmaximising the component.

Since:
2.5.0
See Also:
  • maximiseComponent(Component)
  • ComponentMaximiserMouseListener

  • Constructor Details

    • ComponentMaximiser

      public ComponentMaximiser(Container container)
      Constructs a ComponentMaximiser with the given container.
      Parameters:
      container - the container that will be used to maximise components
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given container is null.

  • Method Details

    • maximiseComponent

      public void maximiseComponent(Component component)
      Maximises the given component, to occupy the whole container.

      The maximisation is done by adding the component directly to the container. If another component is already maximised it does nothing.

      Parameters:
      component - the component to maximise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given component is null.
      See Also:
      • unmaximiseComponent()
      • isComponentMaximised()

    • unmaximiseComponent

      public void unmaximiseComponent()
      Unmaximises the current maximised component.

      It does nothing if no component is maximised.

      See Also:
      • maximiseComponent(Component)

    • isComponentMaximised

      public boolean isComponentMaximised()
      Tells whether or not there is a maximised component.
      Returns:
      true if there is a maximised component, false otherwise.
      See Also:
      • getMaximisedComponent()
      • maximiseComponent(Component)

    • getMaximisedComponent

      public Component getMaximisedComponent()
      Gets the component that is maximised.
      Returns:
      the component maximised, or null if none
      See Also:
      • isComponentMaximised()
